integration: ...you can define your metrics in dbt and then use them in Sisu for one-click analyses.
Continual integrates with dbt by allowing dbt users to define entities, feature sets, and predictive models directly from their existing dbt models.
Holistics fully integrates with your dbt project, allows you to perform data modeling and transformation at dbt layer, and push those definitions to Holistics BI layer
Mode customers can now get better views on data freshness with our dbt integration.
ThoughtSpot’s dbt integration allows you to easily provide your existing dbt models and automatically create ThoughtSpot Worksheets, which you can use to search your data.
Transform then surfaces useful metadata from your dbt models—like the time of the last successful run—and links to model documentation directly in the Transform user interface (UI).
Access the docs & metadata generated from dbt jobs  directly in Sigma.
Lightdash instantly turns your dbt project into a full-stack BI platform. Analysts write metrics and Lightdash enables self-serve for the entire business.
You can define simple metrics in dbt (during transformation/modeling) and derive them in headless BI (GoodData).
FlexIt leverages the lineage feature of dbt to show both upstream model dependencies, as well as downstream dashboards and reports. In addition to lineage paths.
Hex has two separate integrations with dbt Cloud — the dbt metadata integration, and the dbt server integration.
All to say, Validio enables data quality validation to be applied to a much broader set of business critical data sources than dbt tests allow.
Integrate Soda with dbt to access dbt test results from within your Soda Cloud account
Currently, re_data focuses on observing the dbt project (together with underlaying data warehouse - Postgres, BigQuery, Snowflake, Redshift).
Elementary dbt tests collect metrics and metadata over time, such as freshness, volume, schema changes, distribution, cardinality, etc
Automatically quarantining bad data with Bigeye and dbt
Monte Carlo’s integration with dbt Core, helping teams ship more reliable data, faster, through robust testing and monitoring.
Kensu developed a brand new dbt integration that helps engineering teams control data transformations performed by dbt and test data in production.
Workstream integrates with dbt projects to automatically sync exposures and shows real-time monitoring of data quality and freshness.
rakam connects to your dbt core project. You can transform and document your data with dbt and define your metrics as code with our data modeling tool, Metriql.

Bring your existing dbt code, start fresh or start by orchestrating existing dbt cloud jobs as a part of bigger data pipelines. Keboola supports remote execution of dbt jobs on your existing DWH as well. Collect job information, including run artifacts. Visualize dbt docs in one click — no need for scripting and custom hosting.
Prefect enables dbt jobs to be part of cross-platform workflow, with advanced scheduling, dependencies, and failure handling.
DataGalaxy provides a large set of connectors to effortlessly identify and map your physical data, processings, and usages
The information cataloged by the collector includes dbt metadata.
This integration extracts dbt metadata using GraphQL calls and dbt API calls, then transforms the metadata and loads it to Collibra by Collibra API calls.
Easily document your DBT data processes with our automated lineage reconstruction feature.
OpenMetadata integrates metadata from dbt.
There are several tools to capture data lineage from a data source, such as dbt and OpenLineage.
Select Star can integrate with dbt in two ways (Sync dbt documentation, Create separate data source).
With the Secoda and dbt integration, teams can finally get simple data discovery for every employee.
If you use Datakin to observe your dbt models as they run, you can always know exactly where your datasets came from and how they were created.

The new dbt integration collects model, source, lineage and schema information. Other integrations (such as Airflow or Superset) can add relationships between your dbt datasets and charts, pipelines, or external datasets. Now, you can have a complete picture of how dbt connects to the rest of your data ecosystem, all in one place.
Dagster orchestrates dbt alongside other technologies and provides built-in operational and data observability capabilities.
When using the Census dbt integration, dbt CI Checks will run in your GitHub account and let you know if you’re about to drop, rename, or move a dbt model that a Census sync depends on.

Today, we are happy to announce an integration with dbt Metrics. Cube can now read metrics from dbt, merge them into Cube’s data model, provide caching and access control, and expose metrics via our APIs to downstream applications.
Get full test coverage across all your dbt models. See how SQL updates effect tables, columns, rows, and dashboards before merging to production.
PipeRider is a non-intrusive open-source platform for adding profiling and assertions to data sources (such as dbt, Postgres, Snowflake).
Orchestrate custom data transformations in your destination with Transformations for dbt Core
Scalable Self-Service data ingest for DBT.
Integrate SQL based transformations with Airbyte syncs using specialized transformation tool: dbt.
The dbt transformer is a plugin for running SQL-based transformations on data stored in your warehouse.
You will now be able to trigger your existing dbt scripts in a Matillion pipeline without having to write any code or leave your Matillion instance.
Striim streams real-time data into the target warehouse where analysts can leverage dbt to build models and transformations.

Dbt (data build tool) is a solution that enables data analysts and engineers to transform, test, and document data in their cloud data warehouses. Use the connector and blocks to control dbtCloud jobs as an action within Qlik Cloud.
